# addCompletion(_:)

**Instance Method**

Adds a closure to perform operations when the edit menu interaction presentation animations are complete.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func addCompletion(_ completion: @escaping () -> Void)
```

## Parameters

- **completion**: A closure that performs operations after the animations complete.

## Adding Animations

- **addAnimations(_:)**: Adds a closure that performs animations to run alongside the edit menu interaction presentation.
